messages.title: Will you do something for me?
messages.content: I voted Yes in the referendum and I'm asking you to vote Labour on Thursday... I want a left wing Government. I want to see policies that help people in this area and I still want what's best for Scotland.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The minimum Labour MP we elect in Scotland makes it more likely we can get a Labour government in. It's neck and neck down south between Labour and the Tories so your vote could makes all the difference here.

issues.health: support Labour's policies, like banning zero hours contracts, and every Labour MP we elect in Scotland makes it more likely we can get a Labour government in. That can take over the SNP from Labour makes it less likely Labour will get in.

politicalExperience.role: Full time Unite the Union Convenor

contactInformation.address: c/o Gemma Doyle, 49 Landells Terrace, Dumbarton, G82 2BQ

endorsements.endorsement: I want a left wing Government. I want to see policies that help people in this area and I still want what's best for Scotland... Don't risk waking up to another Tory Government, voting Labour is the right thing to do.

images.caption: Flyer cover with text 'Will you do something for me?'

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Duncan Robinson on behalf of Gemma Doyle, at 49 Langlands Terrace, Dumbarton, G82 2BQ. Printed by Think Digital Print,
